{{also|师伯}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=师伯}}

===Etymology===
A compound of {{m|zh|師||teacher}} and {{m|zh|伯||uncle older than one's father}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shībó
|c=si1 baak3
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|martial arts}} The [[senior]] [[fellow]] [[student]] (sihing) of one's teacher in a [[martial arts]] [[school]].
